name: LD 52 - Root Guardian
description:
Florette, our hero, is an adventurer with a deep connection to the natural world. She is a skilled warrior, trained in the ways of her ancestors and able to wield a variety of weapons with grace and precision. She is a beacon of hope and a guardian of the land.

The wilderness has become infected and she has set out on a quest to harvest materials and craft useful items to aid in her quest.

Objective

Explore the forrest and collect materials.  Use the materials to craft useful items and aid you in your journey.

Controls:

WASD - To Move

Q & E - To Turn 90

R - To Turn 180

Mouse Left Button - Interact / Attack

Mouse Right Button - Block
